ValidationRule.description: NICC-032393 - If current status is New or Pending Problem Resolution or Pending Master Recovery, the API cannot change the status.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ( $Profile.Name = "Case Integration Customers - PLATFORM", $User.IsActive, OR( AND( NOT(ISNEW()), ISCHANGED(Status__c), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE (Status__c), "Pending Problem Resolution"), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Status__c,"Pending Problem Resolution")) ), AND( NOT(ISNEW()), ISCHANGED(Status__c), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE (Status__c), "Pending Master Recovery"), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Status__c,"Pending Master Recovery")) ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: If current status is New or Pending Problem Resolution or Pending Master Recovery, the API cannot change the status.
